titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
svasti śrī kōmāṟapaṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉacakra-vattikaḷ emmaṇṭalamuṅ koṇṭaruḷiya śrīkulacēkara
tēvaṟku yāṇṭu 16 vatu taim mātam 14 ti tirumalai nāṭṭut tirukkoṭuṅ kuṉṟat tuṭaiyār tiruk
koṭuṅ-kuṉṟam-uṭaiya nāyaṉār kōyil tēvarkaṉmi śrīmahēśvarak kaṇkāṇi cevvār cikāriyañcevvār
kōyiṟ kaṇakkarōm kēraḷa ciṅka vaḷa nāṭ ṭaruvi yū rāṉa kulacēkara paṭṭiṉattuk kōva
lū ruṭaiyā ṉuyyaniṉ ṟāṭuvāṉ mayilēṟum perumā ḷāṉa nayapālaṟkup piṭipāṭu paṇṇik ku
ṭutta paricāvatu ikkōyilukku ti(ru) vītiyi leḻun taruḷa iḷaiya piḷḷaiyā ri
llāmaiyāl piḷḷaiyāraiyum nāccimāraiyum eḻuntaruḷuvittut tārum amutu
paṭi cāttuppaṭi tirunāḷtēvai yuḷḷiṭṭaṉavum ciripaṇṭārattile ce
luttukiṟō meṉṟu ivaṟku piṭipāṭu muṉpē kuṭuttu ivarum iḷaiyapiḷḷai
yār aḻakiya perumāḷaiyum nāccimārai eḻuntaruḷuvittukkoṇṭu
ṭayum paṇṇuvikkaiyil amutupaṭiyum muṉpu taḷa
tumpaṭi cīpaṇṭārattukku tiru taravēṇumeṉṟu co
pakkalil cī paṇṭārattukku irunūṟu paṇam oṭukkuvittuk
ṭu innāḷ mutal tirunāvukkaracu nāḻiyāl nāḷ oṉṟukku nā
ciyuṅ kaṟiyamutu viñcaṉamum tiruviḷakkum cāttup paṭiyum ta
tāmamum tiruvītiyil eḻuntaruḷummiṭattu āṟān tirunāḷu
ḻicciyum eḻuntaruḷuvikkavum ippaṭi innāḷ mutal can
tavaṟ celuttuvōmāka ippaṭikku iḷaiyapiḷḷaiyār kō
(yili)le kalveṭṭik koḷvārāka ippaṭi cammatittup piṭipāṭu
(paṇ)ṇik kuṭuttōm kōvalūruṭaiyā ṉuyya niṉ ṟāṭuvāṉ mayi
lēṟum perumāḷāṉa nayapālaṟku uṭaiyār tiruk koṭuṅkuṉṟa mu
ṭaiya nāyaṉār kōyil tēva kaṉmi cī mākēcurak kaṇkāṇi cī kāriyañ
ceyvār kōyilk kaṇakkarōm ippaṭikku śrīmākēśvarak kaṇ
kāṇi kūttap perumāḷ eḻuttu ippaṭikku periya tirukkūṭṭa pirama
ātarāyaṉ eḻuttu ippaṭikku cīkāriyam tirucciṟṟampalap pallavatarai
yaṉ eḻuttu ippaṭikku māṭāpattiyam tirumalaiyuṭaiyāṉ eḻuttu
ippaṇam irunūṟu oṭukkuvittu koṇṭamaikku kōyiṟ kaṇakku
āṇṭa piḷḷai eḻuttu
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Reviewed by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy).
